directions: Pour coconut cream into a high-speed blender (such as Vitamix®). Add ube, blueberries, and agave syrup. Cover and blend for about 1 minute, starting at Variable 1 and slowly increasing to the highest speed. Use the tamper to press the ingredients toward the blades.
Serve immediately for a soft-serve consistency. Store in the freezer for a firmer consistency.
title: Vegan Ube-Blueberry Ice Cream
